room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: So much fun! Esmarelda's curse kicked out booties!

room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: Host were very nice and engaging people, game was challenging and well done. Have done other escape games and what I liked about this location was that the waiting area was decorated with puzzles and codes to get you in the spirit of the game. Other locations had boring office like waiting areas.

room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: I had a blast!!! It's definitely a great night out. Can't wait to do it again.

room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: What a fun time! These people are about designing fun - you won't regret spending an hour (or less) locked in a room with your friends or complete strangers!

room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: It was such a blast and they even made sure a birthday card was in the room for my sisters 30th birthday. Everyone should try this place and can't wait to come back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: This place was a blast and there's really nothing quite like it! The attention to detail is very nice. The staff is very friendly and loved to make new customers feel welcomed! We were able to escape the mob room with 2:00 minutes to spare so we got our money's worth but money is the one down side. At $28.00 a head it's not the cheapest thing to do in the world but it's definitely something I'd do at least once!

room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: We have done The Mob room and Esmerelda's Curse. We had a blast and recommend these games for folks who like to solve puzzles and think outside the box! Great times!

room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: Esmerelda's Curse was my second Escape Room challenge and I'm ready for another. The Curse is well designed and has challenging puzzles that range from fairly easy to very complex (not difficult but complex). The Escape the Room building itself is very nice and the staff friendly. They want you to have a good time. My group did, and we look forward to going back.
